titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the period for which the designation of an area as an empowerment zone is in effect.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3391-3392)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/20/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to to extend until December 31, 2016, the designation period for certain tax-favored empowerment zones.
